fast3d.graphics

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.graphics.Texture

  • public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    used to store a texture for a TextureTriangle
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
      constructs a new texture that holds the ARGB-data of the parameter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getAbsolute(Vector2d coord)
      gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
      the coordinates are within 0..width or 0..height (overflow is managed automatically)
      Vector2d getDimension() 
      int getHeight() 
      Color getLogical(Vector2d coord)
      gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
      the coordinates are within 0..1 (overflow is managed automatically)
      int getWidth() 
      static Texture load(java.io.File file)
      loads a Texture from the given file using ImageIO.read
      static Texture load(java.lang.String filename)
      loads a Texture from the given file using ImageIO.read
      void toAbsoluteCoordinate(Vector2d logicalCoordinate)
      converts the given logical coordinate (max = 1) to the corresponding absolute coordinate on this texture (max = width or height)
      void toLogicalCoordinate(Vector2d absCoordinate)
      converts the given absolute coordinate on this texture (max = width or height) to the corresponding logical coordinate (max = 1)

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Vector2d getDimension()
        Returns:
        a vector2d like (width;height)

      • getAbsolute

        public Color getAbsolute(Vector2d coord)
        gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
        the coordinates are within 0..width or 0..height (overflow is managed automatically)
        Parameters:
        coord - the pixel-coordinates
        Returns:
        the argb pixel color (cloned)

      • getLogical

        public Color getLogical(Vector2d coord)
        gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
        the coordinates are within 0..1 (overflow is managed automatically)
        Parameters:
        coord - the logical pixel-coordinates
        Returns:
        the argb pixel color (cloned)

      • toAbsoluteCoordinate

        public void toAbsoluteCoordinate(Vector2d logicalCoordinate)
        converts the given logical coordinate (max = 1) to the corresponding absolute coordinate on this texture (max = width or height)
        Parameters:
        logicalCoordinate - the coordinate to convert

      • toLogicalCoordinate

        public void toLogicalCoordinate(Vector2d absCoordinate)
        converts the given absolute coordinate on this texture (max = width or height) to the corresponding logical coordinate (max = 1)
        Parameters:
        absCoordinate - the coordinate to convert

      • load

        public static Texture load(java.lang.String filename)
        loads a Texture from the given file using ImageIO.read
        Parameters:
        filename - the full name of the file to read
        Returns:
        the texture stored in the file

      • load

        public static Texture load(java.io.File file)
        loads a Texture from the given file using ImageIO.read
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read
        Returns:
        the texture stored in the file
